text: Alan Robert Murray (1954/1955 â€“ February 24, 2021) was an American sound editor. Murray was nominated for ten Academy Awards, which he won two for Best Sound Editing for his work on Letters from Iwo Jima (2005) and American Sniper (2014). Murray died on February 24, 2021, at age 66. ==References== Category:1950s births Category:2021 deaths Category:Academy Award winning editors Category:American editors
title: Alan Robert Murray
